detectors.description: ADD (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADD.sol#47-56) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:Base.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADD.sol#30-32)

	- balanceOf[_from] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADD.sol#25)
	- balanceOf[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADD.sol#26)
